newsitem.title: POLAND: POLISH BOURSE KERB BOND DEALS - JANUARY 16.
newsitem.headline: POLISH BOURSE KERB BOND DEALS - JANUARY 16.

text.p: Turnover in kerb trade through the Warsaw Stock Exchange was at 47.4 million zlotys on Thursday.
The following is a summary of the day's block transactions on the Warsaw bourse.
* 26,568 fixed-interest five-year bonds maturing on October 12, 2000 traded at 84.55 zlotys.
* 175,686 variable-interest three-year bonds maturing on November 6, 1998 traded at 104 zlotys.
* 46,580 variable-interest three-year bonds maturing on November 6, 1998 traded at 104.1 zlotys.
